name: 9to5 (Ayush Bardhan)
description:
This game has been made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44 under the theme "Life is your currency"

Face the life of a 9 to 5 job person and help him do work, reach office in time etc.

But remember that a surprise awaits you...

How to play: Use Mouse and Left Click Button to play. Hover your cursor over different objects to know more and mark when the cursor changes to a hand. The rest you should better figure out...

This game is very buggy and somewhat incomplete and some features also not working. So, sorry about that and the game will be rewritten soon...
